data.name: The Mystery of Duvall Drive
data.description:
"Road trips are usually filled with stories. However, people who drive through Duvall Drive always share the strangest tales. One roadtrip in particular leads to stumbling into a mystery that threatens our very reality."  

This benchmark showcase is a deep dive into some of the best features currently available on Roblox, pushing the boundaries of motion fidelity using some of the newest features available. 

Features like Custom Materials, Layered Clothing, Future lighting on mobile, Streaming Enabled, and advancements in sound design! 

-You can view our "How-To" page for in-depth walkthroughs on how we built the experience:  https://create.roblox.com/docs/resources/the-mystery-of-duvall-drive

-This place is free to copy and use.

data.name: JUDY
data.description:
Welcome to Judy! An intense horror game on the disappearance of a Hollywood star named Judy! by Phantom Archive

WARNINGS: Flashing lights, dark topics, death, loud noises, extreme jumpscares

CH1: You and your friends investigate an old Theme Park from the 70s after it was abandoned. Discover the mystery behind Judy's past and the events leading up to her disappearance.

CH2: After you and your friends investigate the old Theme Park you are lead to the Judy Manor. Discover the manors dark history and involvements with the paranormal, and save Judy from evil.

CH3: After defeating Judy's final form in Chapter II you arrive at the ocean to save Judy from Linda.

data.name: It Lurks
data.description:
According to local popular folklore, something is lurking in the woods. It hides at dawn, but hunts in the dead of night.

Your goal is to group up and survive against the unknown. Be aware of your surroundings. They may be right there to grab you.

Owners: @ragingskull182, @YboiGary

Most Recent Update:

BUG FIXES
- Fixed many of the tool collisions.
- Paragoggles should now be fixed! When using them, you can now see the Rake and the Reptile.
- Reimplemented material-accurate footstep sounds.

ADDITIONS
- Crouching is now crawling to make it feel more like you're being sneaky and avoiding the creatures.
- New and improved Parameter by Rage & Co!
- Popcorn is now added.
- New intermission music.
- Two new dance animations!
- Replaced the field beside the barn.
- Added Silos beside the barn.

Premium users are awarded a free medkit on spawn!

Controls:
C or LeftControl to Crouch (B for Xbox)
LeftShift to Sprint (Left Stick for Xbox)

data.name: Light Bulb: Reillumination
data.description:
Due to a Roblox update in February 2022, a majority of the audios have been broken. History repeats itself, I suppose.

A remake of Zeekerss' "Light Bulb", with more up-to-date scripting and building.

"Light Bulb is an intense psychological thriller with a top-down perspective. You need to escape the maze before you are caught by it. Stay out of the dark, stay quiet, and don't get lost while you're on your way to the exit."

This made for fun and as a tribute to the broken game, it will try to stay as close to the original as possible, with permission from Light Bulb's original creator. More info found in-game. üí°

Feel free to look at some of the other (original) games by the developers in the following group: https://www.roblox.com/groups/3049335/Yokimaa

Roblox search tags: ( Lightbulb Illumination Scary )

This game was uncopylocked to celebrate its 1year anniversary, and in honor of the original, that also went uncopylocked.

data.name: A Landscape of Thorns - The Spike Field
data.description:
This place is a message... 

Sending this message was important to us. We considered ourselves to be a powerful culture.

This place is not a place of honor... no highly esteemed deed is commemorated here... nothing valued is here.

What is here was dangerous and repulsive to us. This message is a warning about danger.

The danger is in a particular location... it increases towards a center... the center of danger is here... of a particular size and shape, and below us.

The danger is still present, in your time, as it was in ours.

The danger is to the body, and it can kill.

The form of the danger is an emanation of energy.

The danger is unleashed only if you substantially disturb this place physically. This place is best shunned and left uninhabited.

data.name: ANXIETY
data.description:
I suffer from a severe social anxiety disorder and depression, and these things can often lead to me just getting really anxious and paranoid while alone. I made this game as a bit of an eye opener, giving an idea of how anxiety can disturb it's victim and cause them to go into a panic attack. Please note that not everyone experiences the same symptoms of anxiety.

==A Puzzled Productions Game==

data.name: 096 [SCP] (BLOOD NIGHT)
data.description:
Your builds save in private servers.

Face the terror of SCP-096, or "Shy Guy", who will stalk you at night if you look directly at its face or through cameras.

You are stranded on an SCP testing island where SCPs, including SCP-173, have escaped containment due to unforeseen events. 

To survive, you must scavenge for resources during the day and build a secure base to protect yourself from the monsters that roam the island at night.

This is a survival horror game.
Your backpack saves when you leave.
Your items drop on the floor when you die.

- blood night

- a lot of bug fixes and QOL improvements
- ui changes to look nicer

data.name: The Maze
data.description:
WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS AND LOUD NOISES!

------- SHORT ANNOUNCEMENT.
At the moment, this game is in a very early state, me and my small team have been working on a REBOOT for this game, planning out story elements, designs and ideas for the future of this project.
Development on The Maze Reboot has been a bit slow due to things like life but also because of my other projects which I will soon be finishing so I can dedicate myself to this game once again!
However, I do want to announce that I plan to get a DEMO for The Maze Reboot out sometime in the future (also known as Update 4.5). Who knows how long it will take but thank you all for the support on this small project!

data.name: [QOL Update] Paranormica 0.9.5
data.description:
Paranormica is a game about paranormal investigations. It's got a lot of modern technical aspects whilst trying to keep that classic roblox feel.

In the game you go to places with paranormal activity and find out what is causing this activity.

Update 0.9.5
+ Updated the player movement physics
+ Added physical hand movements
+ Optimized the truck camera. performance mode has now been removed since it's no longer an issue
+ Added IK to player looking and tool pointing..

VR a very early thing, this will improve over time. Any bugs report in our server.

The ouija board can be found in any room! You can ask questions like. And remember, the ghost needs to be around the board!

"where are you"
"are you here"

If you find any bugs, instead of leaving a dislike please go into the community server and post it in the bugs channel

data.name: The Haunted Imperial hotel
data.description:
Hotel Imperial has been forgotten for years. Many people know the tales that the hotel was the site of many demonic rituals, with some people thinking that below the hotel is the entrance to hell.. 


The hotel was finally closed on Halloween of 2009 when a mysterious shift in the earth caused large sections of the building to collapse into the earth, swallowing rooms and corridors whole, many with guests still in them. Reports are that some people fell as far as 30 meters into the earth to their deaths. Since then the hotel has been left abandoned and is currently sinking deeper into the ground, where it will collapse completely.

Once upon a time, a family comprising of parents and their daughter, Elvira, went for a walk. Suddenly, her parents disappeared mysteriously. Alone and determined to find her way back home, Elvira stumbled upon a peculiar doll amidst a pile of trash. The moment she held the doll, she vanished and remained missing since 1985.

Do you have the courage to face the darkness and uncover the sinister secrets that lie ahead? The answers await you in this bone-chilling horror game. Remember, in the world of "Missing Elvira," evil lurks in every corner, and your survival instincts will be put to the ultimate test.
